title: Digital Ocean
description: Digital Ocean is known for its distinctive blue color '#0080FF'. The brand's color scheme signifies trust, reliability, and innovation, aligning with its focus on providing streamlined and efficient cloud computing solutions. This color is prominently featured in their marketing and brand materials, reinforcing its identity as a forward-thinking and dependable service provider. For detailed arrays of logos and adherence guidelines, Digital Ocean provides resources directly on their company website and brand center.
